TopicTitle: How do you cheat free crafts in on carrer mode?

Articles.Content:
Like the title says?

Edited October 21, 2015 by UnknownOrbit

I guess you could probably edit in a whole craft by editing a save file, but I've never done this and I'd have to spend time experimenting to figure out what's involved. Unlikely since I can't really imagine why you'd want to. If u want things to be free, don't play career.

AFAIK, you can't just cheat free crafts in the game, you'll have to give yourself funds, and then make whatever craft you want.

Either edit your savefile, or maybe it is somewhere in the debug menu.

Yeah just give yourself the cash. I've done this before when the Kraken took my space station from me.

I rebuilt it in the VAB, cheated the cash, hyperedited it into orbit, and called it even.
In the space centre screen press AND HOLD Alt + F12 for a few seconds (you'll know when its enough) and you can give yourself all the the funds, rep and science you want.
